Token.Abstract: This class exposes API that allow to intercept method call and introspect the object being intercepted. It can be used to record timing & usage information for example.
Enable or disable this instrumentation instance
Enable or disable this instrumentation instance
Enable or disable this instrumentation instance
Returns an instrumentation instance for the specified class

Parameter.Name: clazz
Parameter.Abstract: The class to be instrumented

Token.Abstract: Returns an instrumentation instance for the class with the specified name.

Parameter.Name: className
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the class to be instrumented.

Token.Abstract: Returns the interceptor configured for the class with the given selector, or nil if an interceptor is not configured for the given selector.

Parameter.Name: selector
Parameter.Abstract: The selector to check

Parameter.Name: isInstanceSelector
Parameter.Abstract: Whether or not the selector is an instance selector.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The configured SFMethodInterceptor instance, or nil if an interceptor is not configured.

Token.Abstract: Use this method to intercept the instance method specified by selector

Parameter.Name: selector
Parameter.Abstract: The selector to intercept

Parameter.Name: before
Parameter.Abstract: An optional block invoked before the selector is executed

Parameter.Name: after
Parameter.Abstract: An optional block invoked after the selector is executed

Token.Abstract: Use this method to intercept the instance method specified by selector and provide a block that will be invoked instead of the method. Note: the block contains a single argument which is the NSInvocation of the message.

Parameter.Name: selector
Parameter.Abstract: The instance method to be intercepted

Parameter.Name: replace
Parameter.Abstract: The block to be invoked

Token.Abstract: Use this method to intercept the class method specified by selector

Parameter.Name: selector
Parameter.Abstract: The selector to intercept

Parameter.Name: before
Parameter.Abstract: An optional block invoked before the selector is executed

Parameter.Name: after
Parameter.Abstract: An optional block invoked after the selector is executed

Token.Abstract: Use this method to intercept the class method specified by selector and provide a block that will be invoked instead of the method. Note: the block contains a single argument which is the NSInvocation of the message.

Parameter.Name: selector
Parameter.Abstract: The instance method to be intercepted

Parameter.Name: replace
Parameter.Abstract: The block to be invoked

Token.Abstract: Instrument some selectors of a the target class for performance timing.

Parameter.Name: selectorFilter
Parameter.Abstract: A block invoked when to select selectors from the class to instrument

Parameter.Name: after
Parameter.Abstract: An optional block invoked after any selector is executed

Token.Abstract: Instrument some selectors of the target class and its parent class(es) for performance timing.

Parameter.Name: selectorFilter
Parameter.Abstract: A block invoked when to select selectors from the class to instrument

Parameter.Name: numInheritanceLevels
Parameter.Abstract: The number of inherited classes whose selectors will be made available.

Parameter.Name: after
Parameter.Abstract: An optional block invoked after any selector is executed

Token.Abstract: Loads the array of instructions execute them. The instructions usually comes from a JSON file.

Parameter.Name: instructions
Parameter.Abstract: The array of instructions

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: Optional completion block
